verses.verse: It is actually<WG3654> reported<WG191> that there is<WG3748> fornication<WG4202> among<WG1722> you<WG5213>, and<WG2532> such<WG5108> fornication<WG4202> as is<WG3748> not even<WG3761> among<WG1722> the Gentiles<WG1484>, that<WG5620> one<WG5100> of you hath<WG2192> his<WG3588> father<WG3962>'s wife<WG1135>.

in <WG1722> the name<WG3686> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424>, 5547, 4863 ye<WG5216> being gathered together<WG4863>, and<WG2532> my<WG1700> spirit<WG4151>, with<WG4862> the power<WG1411> of our<WG2257> Lord2962, 5547 Jesus<WG2424>,

Your <WG5216> glorying<WG2745> is not<WG3756> good<WG2570>. Know ye<WG1492> not<WG3756> that<WG3754> a little<WG3398> leaven<WG2219> leaveneth<WG2220> the whole<WG3650> lump<WG5445>?

Purge out<WG1571> the old<WG3820> leaven<WG2219>, that<WG2443> ye may be<WG5600> a new<WG3501> lump<WG5445>, even<WG2532> as<WG2531> ye are<WG2075> unleavened<WG106>. For<WG1063> our<WG2257> passover<WG3957> also hath been sacrificed<WG2380>, even<WG2532> Christ<WG5547>:

wherefore <WG5620> let us keep the feast<WG1858>, not<WG3361> with<WG1722> old<WG3820> leaven<WG2219>, neither<WG3366> with<WG1722> the leaven<WG2219> of malice<WG2549> and<WG2532> wickedness<WG4189>, but<WG235> with<WG1722> the unleavened<WG106> bread of sincerity<WG1505> and<WG2532> truth<WG225>.
I wrote<WG1125> unto you<WG5213> in<WG1722> my epistle<WG1992> to have no<WG3361> company<WG4874> with fornicators<WG4205>;

<WG2532> not<WG3756> at all meaning<WG3843> with the fornicators<WG4205> of this<WG5127> world<WG2889>, or<WG2228> with the covetous<WG4123> and<WG2228> extortioners<WG727>, or<WG2228> with idolaters<WG1496>; for<WG1893> then<WG686> must ye needs<WG3784> go out<WG1831> of<WG1537> the world<WG2889>:

but <WG1161> as it is<WG3570>, I wrote<WG1125> unto you<WG5213> not<WG3361> to keep company<WG4874>, if<WG1437> any man<WG5100> that is named a<WG2228> brother<WG80> be<WG1510> a<WG2228> fornicator<WG4205>, or<WG2228> covetous<WG4123>, or<WG2228> an idolater<WG1496>, or<WG2228> a reviler<WG3060>, or<WG2228> a drunkard<WG3183>, or<WG2228> an extortioner<WG727>; with such a one<WG5108> no<WG3366>, not to eat<WG4906>.

For <WG1063> what<WG5101> have I<WG3427> to do with judging<WG2919> them3588, 2532 that are<WG2532> without<WG1854>? Do<WG2919> not<WG3780> ye<WG5210> judge<WG2919> them that are<WG3588> within<WG2080>?
But <WG1161> them that are without<WG1854> God<WG2316> judgeth<WG2919>. <WG2532> Put away<WG1808> the<WG846> wicked man<WG4190> from<WG1537> among yourselves<WG5216>.
